Design Systems Overview

Design systems are Pattern Libraries: a big box of UI Lego pieces that can be assembled in any ways. All the pieces may be consistent, but that doesn't mean the assembled results will be. It has structure and meaning.

This design system is meant for aligning the UI for widgets developed by different teams for the Winnow Platform.

Noticed a typo? Or something unclear? Please connect with Johnson Koh
